title: Finding needles in haystacks: identification of novel conserved 1
steps: The Streptomyces plates were incubated at 30 °C for 10 days or longer before investigating the 436
coli was grown on Luria-Burtani (LB) agar or in LB cultures overnight at 37 °C
The strains are inoculated on the plates using the stamping method
Plates and additives are described in table 1
spores were inoculated on StrepMM Difco with GlcNAc [25 mM] and BHET [10 mM]
